title: Excuse me, what?
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/5c3160a53ef1e2cff1bdd6b961f7d091.png

This seems a little stupid. With how snowflakey this game is, is anyone going to get the skin?

I got 14 day banned for inting one game and now I get no skin. Ok.

replies.body: does 2 ques mean we have to be in a team of 2 or more please? Was it a ranked match? o.o

> [{quoted}](name=Pikachoochoo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HYhp7H2o,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-07T06:16:39.334+0000)
>
> does 2 ques mean we have to be in a team of 2 or more please? Was it a ranked match? o.o

2 Queues means Gold in Solo/Duo, Ranked TT, and/or Flex Queue

For example i'm currently Gold in TT, Flex and will be getting both Skin and Chroma (Unless i do something toxic like last year...)

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HYhp7H2o,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-11-07T07:08:09.693+0000)
>
> 2 Queues means Gold in Solo/Duo, Ranked TT, and/or Flex Queue
> 
> For example i'm currently Gold in TT, Flex and will be getting both Skin and Chroma (Unless i do something toxic like last year...)

so if I qued by myself in solo duo it still counts towards both skins then o.-? Who's the champ please, I thought it was Panth or Singed doing a funny pose but nope

> [{quoted}](name=Pikachoochoo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HYhp7H2o,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-07T07:21:22.558+0000)
>
> so if I qued by myself in solo duo it still counts towards both skins then o.-? Who's the champ please, I thought it was Panth or Singed doing a funny pose but nope

No, You need Gold in **2** queues, as i said before, Flex, Solo/Duo, or TT, you must have gold in 2 of those in order to get both rewards, otherwise if you're gold in only one of those, you will get the base skin and no chroma

The champ is aatrox

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HYhp7H2o,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-07T07:37:31.129+0000)
>
> No, You need Gold in **2** queues, as i said before, Flex, Solo/Duo, or TT, you must have gold in 2 of those in order to get both rewards, otherwise if you're gold in only one of those, you will get the base skin and no chroma
> 
> The champ is aatrox

okay ty
